text: Juan Manuel de Alba Flores (born August 27, 1994 in Jalisco) is a Mexican professional footballer who plays for Inter Playa. ==References== ==External links== *Juan de Alba at Official Liga MX Profile * Juan de Alba at Fox Stats * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Chiapas F.C. footballers Category:Querétaro F.C. footballers Category:Irapuato F.C. footballers Category:Cimarrones de Sonora players Category:Loros UdeC footballers Category:Inter Playa del Carmen players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Footballers from Jalisco Category:People from Ocotlán, Jalisco
title: Juan de Alba
